biz.aduna.map.cluster
Class DefaultClusterModel

java.lang.Object
  biz.aduna.map.cluster.DefaultClusterModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClusterModel
public class DefaultClusterModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusterModel

DefaultClusterModel provides a complete implementation of ClusterModel. It can be created with a given set of Classifications and Clusters. Alternatively, it can be created with only a set of Classifications, so that it calculates the set of Clusters itself.

Field Summary
protected  java.util.HashSet classifications
          The set of Classifications from which the set Clusters is calculated.
protected  java.util.Collection clusters
          The set of Clusters contained in this DefaultClusterModel.
 
Constructor Summary
DefaultClusterModel()
          Creates a new, empty DefaultClusterModel.
DefaultClusterModel(java.util.Collection classifications)
          Creates a new DefaultClusterModel based on the specified set of Classifications.
DefaultClusterModel(java.util.Collection classifications, java.util.Collection clusters)
          Creates a new DefaultClusterModel that contains specified set of Clusters, based on the specified set of Classifications.
 
Method Summary
protected  void calculateClusters()
           
 java.util.Collection getClassifications()
          Returns the Classifications on which this ClusterModel was based.
 java.util.Collection getClusters()
          Returns the Clusters contained in this ClusterModel.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Field Detail

classifications

protected java.util.HashSet classifications
The set of Classifications from which the set Clusters is calculated.

clusters

protected java.util.Collection clusters
The set of Clusters contained in this DefaultClusterModel. This set can either be generated by or passed to the constructor of this DefaultClusterModel.

Constructor Detail

DefaultClusterModel

public DefaultClusterModel()
Creates a new, empty DefaultClusterModel.

DefaultClusterModel

public DefaultClusterModel(java.util.Collection classifications)
Creates a new DefaultClusterModel based on the specified set of Classifications. This automatically calculates the set of Clusters.

DefaultClusterModel

public DefaultClusterModel(java.util.Collection classifications,
                           java.util.Collection clusters)
Creates a new DefaultClusterModel that contains specified set of Clusters, based on the specified set of Classifications. Beware that no check is done whether the set of Clusters is consistent with the set of Classifications.

Method Detail

getClassifications

public java.util.Collection getClassifications()
Returns the Classifications on which this ClusterModel was based.

getClassifications in interface ClusterModel

public java.util.Collection getClusters()
Returns the Clusters contained in this ClusterModel.

Specified by:
getClusters in interface ClusterModel
